definition: to tell fortune by reading the subject's facial features
to look after/to take care of/to watch/to guard
to see/to look at/to read/to watch/to visit/to call on/to consider/to regard as/to look after/to treat (an illness)/to depend on/to feel (that)/(after verb) to give it a try/Watch out! (for a danger)

sentences.english: He told her parents that the girl had a noble fate and a very promising future.
sentences.chinese: 甄夫人非常相信，請他逐一爲自己兒女看相算命。

sentences.english: You look good for your age. ;
sentences.chinese: 以你的年齡而言，你的看相還很好。
